name: Pixelblast TD
description:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Shark3143

Discord: Shark3143#3143

Pixelblast TD is a free game created for the 2019 Devtober challenge.
The game is controlled entirely using the mouse.

Pixel Fonts by Eeve Somepx
Fonts Used: Humble Fonts -- Free

Royalty-Free Music by HeatleyBros Music
Song: "8 Bit Space Groove!"

Gameplay Tips and Tricks:
-Laser Towers counter the 'swarm' wave.
-Freeze Towers counter the 'fast' wave.
-Sniper Towers counter the 'boss' wave.
-Sniper Towers can be placed at diagonals to walls and other towers.
